about_the_game:
"Game of Fate" DLC 4k version is 60 frame rate, can get better visual effects.
This product does not include the Game itself, and users who already have "Game of Fate" can get 4K super clear visual experience after purchasing this DLC.

About This Game

If you had the power to change the past, what would you most want to do?
…
There are many imperfect things in this world. What if a momentary choice brings worse consequences?
…
Friends are not all the same. Can you really be responsible for your choices?

Small choices can have huge impacts, just like the flutter of a butterfly's wings can cause a storm thousands of miles away.
In "Game of Fate", solving cases and finding the truth are sometimes full of tests of desire. Faced with a fate you are unwilling to accept, you will decide whether to sacrifice your existing ordinary happiness in exchange for the risky truth behind it, whether to use simple and crude methods to save others' lives in times of crisis, whether to lose your rationality and indulge yourself in sweet words, and whether to stick to your original intention when touching the gray area between emotion and reason.

"Game of Fate" is a first-person science fiction suspense work set in an imaginary world view, with the themes of "life choices" and "suspenseful case-solving". The work uses full-motion real-person interactive filming, and the plot line is very complex with multiple endings.
In the plot, you will start a magical adventure from a first-person perspective. The background of the fictional world view allows the surreal science fiction elements and the true feelings that hit the heart to blend harmoniously. And you, as the most core character in the whole work, will continue to search for clues in the two time and space of 2019 and 2024, and explore the truth of several strange cases with other friends in the plot, and gain different emotional experiences.
The case is full of mystery. Who is the murderer? Who will be killed next time?

Facing innocent victims, can you save them? Can you find out the truth?
Time flows, emotions change, countless tests of human nature, countless life and death decisions, nothing is accidental.
After experiencing different emotional experiences, which one do you miss the most? Which person fascinates you the most?

Following those changeable clues, you will delve deeper into the mystery step by step. The various choices you experience in the work may be related to future happiness, touch upon desires and human nature, or involve blessings, disasters, life and death. You will explore more than 50 endings, make judgments at many crossroads, and move towards the destiny you have woven.

Write your own script in the complex intersection of time and space, and uncover the truth you want in the complex changes of the mystery. This is not only a race against time to investigate and adventure, but also a "Game of Fate" that travels through time and space, and transcends life and death!

Features:

First Person Perspective, Sci-fi Suspense
Shooting from a first-person perspective enhances your sense of immersion in the scenes and plots, giving you an immersive movie-like experience. This pure original science fiction + suspense + emotional story allows you to experience the thrill of traveling through time and space, immersing yourself in the scene and solving the mystery.

Choice-driven, Mesh-structure Branch
With rich hidden plots and a mesh-like branching structure, the work has more than fifty different endings and hundreds of branches. Each choice node may lead to a completely different development of events.

Cause and Effect Interweaving, Emotional Resonance
The work focuses on creating emotionally profound stories and rich characters, providing you with a deep emotional involvement experience, allowing you to experience the ups and downs of life stories from a first-person perspective. Each character contains hidden plots. You may unlock unique experiences that the character has never revealed by making specific achievements.

Card Collection Gameplay, Full of Love
The work also includes Tarot card collection gameplay, where you can collect limited edition character cards,Including more than 100 main character cards with different designs, unlock more hidden secrets about the characters, and feel the affection of each character from the details.

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains sensitive content such as drinking and seduction and may not be suitable for all ages.
